attributes.action: Form national team of food retailers supporting FSM in school CV19 closure
attributes.additional_details: Get all major retailers to agree on basis meal deal provision with variety of cost effective sandwiches, fruit or basic heatable meals to ensure the most vulnerable have the energy and strength to remain fit & strong in the fight if their lives. Schools individually ate not equipped to do this on their own. This is a national challenge and can present as one of the greatest signs of developing community and ensuring all FSM, in all schools and regions are adequately supported. Anything less? No.
attributes.background: Schools will close given the significant challenges with students and staff struck by CV19. Our most vulnerable in most deprived communities will be decimated unless we safeguard their daily subsistence with access  to a range of outlets providing some form of voucher based support to be fed daily.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced the closure of schools and colleges, and has said that, to support children eligible for free school meals, schools will be able to provide meals or vouchers for supermarkets or local shops: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/schools-colleges-and-early-years-settings-to-close

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
